DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The function being assigned or passed should have a _Function_class_ annotation for at least one of the class(es) in: 'DRIVER_DISPATCH': Frequently, when only one function class is in use, this is caused by not declaring a callback to be of the appropriate type.

The dispatch function 'DispatchIRPs' does not have any _Dispatch_type_ annotations: This can be corrected by adding appropriate _Dispatch_type_ annotations to the function. Unnecessary casts can cause this warning.
